about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack for Clustertruck. The tracks included are:

1. Diesel Desert
2. Wayward Woods
3. Wheely Winterland
4. Crystal Mines
5. The Truckhold
6. Lost Ruins
7. Neotropolis
8. Cogworld
9. Hell is other Trucks
10. Final Truckdown
11. Credits
12. Make stuff (editor)
13. Get Trucked (Bonus trailer song)
detailed_description:
This is the original soundtrack for Clustertruck. The tracks included are:

1. Diesel Desert
2. Wayward Woods
3. Wheely Winterland
4. Crystal Mines
5. The Truckhold
6. Lost Ruins
7. Neotropolis

10. Final Truckdown
11. Credits
12. Make stuff (editor)
13. Get Trucked (Bonus trailer song)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything that plays music files
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Irrelevant
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything that plays audio
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Irrelevant
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo

name: Clustertruck OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and up
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: It's an OST, any video card that runs the OS will work
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo preferable

short_description: Support indie composers by buying the official Clustertruck OST, featuring 13 trucks from the infamous truck-jumping platformer
